name: White Blood Cell Count
title: White Blood Cell Count
notes:
**Note 1:** **Collect for all years at this time** This SSDI is effective for diagnosis years xxxx    
* For cases diagnosed xxxx-xxxx, leave this SSDI blank

**Note 2:** Physician statement of WBC (White Blood Cell Count) Pretreatment Lab Value can be used to code this data item when no other information is available

**Note 3:** Record the lab value of the highest WBC test result documented in the medical record **prior to treatment**. The lab value may be recorded in a lab report, history and physical, or clinical statement in the pathology report

**Note 4:** Record to the nearest microliter (cells/mcL) the highest WBC lab value documented in the medical record **prior to treatment**.
rows:
0.0-9999.9 microliter (cells/mcL)
(Exact value to nearest tenth in cells/mcL)
Lab value not available, physician states WBC is normal
Lab value not available, physician states WBC is elevated/high
Test ordered, results not in chart

Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
(If this information is required by your standard setter, use of code XXXX.8 may result in an edit error)

Not documented in medical record
WBC (White Blood Cell Count) Pretreatment Lab Value not assessed or unknown if assessed
N/A - Diagnosis year is prior to xxxx
